title: Burp Suite Repeater
extract: Burp repeater. Let us now move to Burp repeater in this Burp Suite tutorial. Burp repeater is a tool used to manually modify the HTTP requests and test the responses given by the page. This can even lead to probing for vulnerabilities on the webpage. Basically, this is used to play back requests to the server.
extract_html: Burp repeater. Let us now move to Burp repeater in this Burp Suite tutorial. Burp repeater is a tool used to manually modify the HTTP requests and test the responses given by the page. This can even lead to probing for vulnerabilities on the webpage. Basically, this is used to play back requests to the server.
